title: 02/24/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 02/24/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On today’s Dan Patrick Show, DP opened the show talking about the scary car accident

involving golf legend Tiger Woods. While there is a long road to recovery, Dan emphasizes that

It is a blessing that Woods is alive. Mike Florio joined the show to talk about the never-ending

conversation that is the NFL offseason. Will we see the 49ers move on from Jimmy G? And actors Adam Sandler and Chris McDonald aka Happy Gilmore and Shooter McGavin, from the popular movie “Happy Gilmore”, call in to talk about the 25 year anniversary of the movie.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
On today’s Dan Patrick Show, DP opened the show talking about the scary car accident

involving golf legend Tiger Woods. While there is a long road to recovery, Dan emphasizes that

It is a blessing that Woods is alive. Mike Florio joined the show to talk about the never-ending

conversation that is the NFL offseason. Will we see the 49ers move on from Jimmy G? And actors Adam Sandler and Chris McDonald aka Happy Gilmore and Shooter McGavin, from the popular movie “Happy Gilmore”, call in to talk about the 25 year anniversary of the movie.
